data.claim: The dual_direction_design skill creates a structured feedback loop: (1) Create 2 contrasting directions in Pencil, (2) Evaluate on 8 weighted criteria (visual_clarity, hierarchy, user_flow, brand_alignment, technical_feasibility, consistency, accessibility, mobile_responsiveness), (3) Blend best elements, (4) Store DesignDecision as artifact. This creates traceable design rationale that compounds over time.
